mapper.select: SELECT MUS_ID, MUS_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, POSTER, STATUS, THEATHER_NAME, GENRE FROM SHOW JOIN THEATER USING(THEATER_ID) JOIN SHOW_GENRE USING(GENRE_NO) ORDER BY START_DATE ASC

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(MUS_ID) DESC) "RANKING", MUS_ID, MUS_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, POSTER, STATUS, THEATHER_NAME FROM RESERVE RE JOIN BOOK BK ON (BK.BOOK_NO = RE.RES_NO) FULL JOIN SHOW SH USING(MUS_ID) JOIN THEATER USING(THEATER_ID) GROUP BY MUS_ID, MUS_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, POSTER, STATUS, THEATHER_NAME ) A
SELECT MUS_ID, MUS_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, POSTER, STATUS, THEATHER_NAME FROM SHOW JOIN THEATER USING(THEATER_ID) ORDER BY MUS_TITLE ASC
